title: Inbound Customer Service
description: AI agent answers an incoming customer call, verifies identity, answers FAQ and takes message of customer needs.

title: New Client Appointment
description: AI agent books appointments for new or existing clients. The agent can take inbound calls, or place outbound calls to get appointments scheduled.

title: Lead Follow-Up
description: AI agent follows up with a new lead, answers basic questions, and books a call or appointment with your team.

title: Estimate Outreach
description: AI agent reaches out regarding a service inquiry, provides basic information, and schedules an estimate or consultation.

title: Status Follow-Up
description: AI agent provides a status update on an ongoing request and answers common questions so customers stay informed.
